title: Problem 2104_D
statement: You are given an integer array a of size n.You can perform the following operations any number of times (possibly, zero): pay one coin and increase any element of the array by 1 (you must have at least 1 coin to perform this operation); gain one coin and decrease any element of the array by 1.
